Room.Name: Standing on a beach.
Room.Description: Standing on a beach the water foams behind you. The sea writhing looks as if it has a life of it's own. Mountains loom in the distance and a small path heads up towards them to the North.

Room.Name: Hills
Room.Description: Walking up the hills the path grows steeper and steeper. The green grasses fading away to rocks and bolders. In the distance you can see a door carved into the side of the mountain.

Room.Name: Standing before an Iron bound door.
Room.Description: A huge Iron bound door cuts off the path into the mountain. Although as old as the world itself, it looks as though it were made but yesterday. Beside the door words of an unknown language are etched into the mountain. Strange writings upon the walls around the door catches your eye.

Exit.Flags: Door Closed Locked PickProof NoPass NoBash

ExtraDescription.Description: You see markings all over the walls scrawled in blood and feces. You can make out only parts of words and phrases. You can make out a phrase saying "Only Death and Dismemberment Lie Beyond. Some other words you make out barely speaks of the Lord and paying Homage to meet him.

Room.Name: Within the Mountain
Room.Description: As you step a foot within the room the door behind you closes and dissapears completly. The room's air is stale and reeks of death. Nothing can be heard not even your footsteps.

Exit.Flags: Door Closed NoPass

Room.Name: Corridor Crossing
Room.Description: Moving from the last room your footfalls sound as if beat upon drums. You feel tired and lethargic just moving between the rooms.The corridor runs along to the east. The walls are black and smooth to the east they seem to absorb all light that touches it. The corridor to the west is a red and looks as though painted with blood itself. The Northern corridor shines a blue that compared to the black almost blinds you . The exits to the North, west and east a corridor long and seemingly endless lay.

Exit.Flags: Door Closed NoPass

Room.Name: Black Corridor to the East
Room.Description: The corridor runs along to the east. The walls are black and smooth to the touch they seem to absorb all light that touches it. The corridor continues to the east and back to the west.

Room.Name: Black Corridor to the East
Room.Description: The corridor runs along to the east. The walls are black and smooth to the touch they seem to absorb all light that touches it. The corridor continues to the east and back to the west.

Room.Name: Black Corridor to the East
Room.Description: The corridor runs along to the east. The walls are black and smooth to the touch and absorb all light that shines upon it. The corridor continues to the east and back to the west.

Room.Name: Turn in the Black Corridor
Room.Description: The corridor comes to an end, the walls are so black they absorb the light and you almost run into the end of the corridor. The corridor goes back to the West or continues to the North

Room.Name: Two doors in the Black Corridor
Room.Description: Two doors in the walls are barely visable and made of something that absorbs light like the walls. The doors have writing glowing upon the locks in them. "Keeper of the Keys" read upon the door to the east and "Keeper of Souls" read upon the door to the west. You can continue north in the corridor or South.

Exit.Flags: Door Closed PickProof NoPass NoBash
Door PickProof NoPass NoBash Closed

Room.Name: The Keepers Room
Room.Description: The room is bare save for a figure standing in the middle. A permenant grin upon it's face as you enter.

Exit.Flags: Door Closed PickProof NoPass NoBash

Room.Name: The Keepers Room
Room.Description: Bodies and carcases lie strewn about in this room. Sitting upon a dark throne a figure stares at you making you blood run cold.

Exit.Flags: Door PickProof NoPass NoBash Closed

Room.Name: Black Corridor
Room.Description: The corridor moves to the North and South. The walls are black and smooth to the touch absorbing all light cast upon them.

Room.Name: Two doors in the Black Corridor
Room.Description: Two doors in the walls are barely visable and made of something that absorbs light like the walls. You can continue north in the corridor or South.

Exit.Flags: Door Closed Locked PickProof NoPass NoBash
Door Closed Locked PickProof NoPass NoBash

Room.Name: Watchers Room
Room.Description: Within the room a lone man stand faceing a glowing ball upon a pedestal. The man looks as if to be looking into the past and future at the same time images flicker about the ball , making you dizzy.

Exit.Flags: Door Closed Locked PickProof NoPass NoBash

Room.Name: Cleric's Room
Room.Description: Within the room object of clerical prayers and spiritual summonings adorn the walls. Standing within the room is the head cleric. You can go back out to the east.

Exit.Flags: Door Closed Locked PickProof NoPass NoBash

Room.Name: Turn in the Black Corridor
Room.Description: The Black corridor turns. You can go to the west or to the south.

Room.Name: Black Corridor
Room.Description: The walls are black and smooth to the touch they seem to absorb all light that touches it. The corridor continues to the east and to the west.

Room.Name: Black Corridor
Room.Description: The walls are black and smooth to the touch they seem to absorb all light that touches it. The corridor continues to the east and to the west.

Room.Name: Black Corridor
Room.Description: The walls are black and smooth to the touch they seem to absorb all light that touches it. The corridor continues to the east and to the west.

Room.Name: Crossing of the Corridors
Room.Description: The corridors come to a cross in this room, each one of the colors give way to the grey in the room. To the south is the red the east is the black and to the west is blue. To the north the grey continues.

Room.Name: Blood Corridor
Room.Description: The walls are blood red and looks as though painted with blood itself. The corridor continues to the east and to the west.

Room.Name: Blood Corridor
Room.Description: The walls are blood red and looks as though painted with blood itself. The corridor continues to the east and to the west.

Room.Name: Blood Corridor
Room.Description: The walls are blood red and looks as though painted with blood itself. The corridor continues to the east and to the west.

Room.Name: Turn In The Blood Corridor
Room.Description: The corridor comes to an end and the walls seem as if they writh and drip the blood upon the ground. The corridor goes to the south or to the east.

Room.Name: Blood Corridor
Room.Description: The walls are blood red and looks as though painted with blood itself. The corridor continues to the south and to the north.

Room.Name: Blood Corridor
Room.Description: The walls are blood red and looks as though painted with blood itself. The corridor continues to the south and to the north.

Room.Name: Blood Corridor
Room.Description: The walls are blood red and looks as though painted with blood itself. The corridor continues to the south and to the north.

Room.Name: Turn In The Blood Corridor
Room.Description: The corridor comes to an end and the walls seem as if they writh and drip the blood upon the ground. The corridor goes to the north or to the east.

Room.Name: Blood Corridor
Room.Description: The walls are blood red and looks as though painted with blood itself. The corridor continues to the east and to the west.

Room.Name: Blood Corridor
Room.Description: The walls are blood red and looks as though painted with blood itself. The corridor continues to the east and to the west.

Room.Name: Blood Corridor
Room.Description: The walls are blood red and looks as though painted with blood itself. The corridor continues to the east and to the west.

Room.Name: Blue Corridor
Room.Description: The Corridor is a blue so deep and vibrant not even the oceans could give it justice. Doors line the corridor to the east and west. Upon the Locks are markings.The language is the Same as upon the Entrance door. It sounds within your mind. The door to the east speaks "Ringkeeper's Room" and the Door to the west speaks "Library Room".

Exit.Flags: Door Closed PickProof NoPass NoBash
Door Closed Locked PickProof NoPass NoBash

Room.Name: Blue Library
Room.Description: Shelves upon shelves of books line the room. Books that are now a blue hue from the light of the walls in the room. A lone Custodian keeps the books prestine.

Exit.Flags: Door Closed Locked PickProof NoPass NoBash

Room.Name: Ringkeeper's Room
Room.Description: This room houses the blue ringkeeper. He guards the keys upon his belt with his life and eyes you suspicously as you walk in.

Exit.Flags: Door Closed PickProof NoPass NoBash

Room.Name: Blue Corridor
Room.Description: The Corridor is a blue so deep and vibrant not even the oceans could give it justice. The corridor continues to the south and to the north.

Room.Name: Blue Corridor
Room.Description: The Corridor is a blue so deep and vibrant not even the oceans could give it justice. Doors line the corridor to the east and west. Upon the Locks are markings.The language is the Same as upon the Entrance door. It sounds within your mind. The door to the east speaks "Slaves Room" and the Door to the west speaks "Master's Room".

Exit.Flags: Door Closed Locked PickProof NoPass NoBash
Door Closed Locked PickProof NoPass NoBash

Room.Name: Master's Room
Room.Description: In this room a obese man lays upon pillows and blankets and is waited upon by his harem girls.

Exit.Flags: Door Closed Locked PickProof NoPass NoBash

Room.Name: Slaves Room
Room.Description: In this room you see the harem girls that have disobeyed or lost thier use. They are tied up and are bled into a drain in the floor. They are kept alive barely..

Exit.Flags: Door Closed Locked PickProof NoPass NoBash

Room.Name: Grey Room
Room.Description: The room looks of a dull grey, it seems as though there once was color upon the walls but it has been stripped somehow.. You look up and you can see the green of the grass outside, it shimmers and flickers for a moment. You can not see anything down and a voice booms within your head " Last chance to getting out, there is no going back once you go down." You can go south , or down.

Room.Name: Dismal room
Room.Description: You feel burdened by some unseen force here. You can barely keep you legs under you as you take a few steps to get used to the weakness. You can go to the east and west both seem as utterly hopeless to continue down.

Room.Name: Dismal room
Room.Description: You feel burdened by some unseen force here. You can barely keep you legs under you as you take a few steps to get used to the weakness. You can go to the east and west both seem as utterly hopeless to continue down.

Room.Name: Dismal Room
Room.Description: You feel burdened by some unseen force here. You can barely keep you legs under you as you take a few steps to get used to the weakness. You can go to the east and west both seem as utterly hopeless to continue down.

Room.Name: Dismal Room
Room.Description: You feel burdened by some unseen force here. You can barely keep you legs under you as you take a few steps to get used to the weakness. You can go to the east, west or north. All seem as utterly hopeless to continue down.

Exit.Flags: Door Closed NoPass

Room.Name: Guard Room
Room.Description: Standing in the room are guards weeping uncontrolably. You can tell that they have been here a long time.

Exit.Flags: Door Closed NoPass
Door Closed Locked PickProof NoPass NoBash

Room.Name: Prisoner's Room
Room.Description: The room is dank and dismal it looks clean, a bit too clean...

Exit.Flags: Door Closed Locked PickProof NoPass NoBash

Room.Name: Dismal Room
Room.Description: You feel burdened by some unseen force here. You can barely keep you legs under you as you take a few steps to get used to the weakness. You can go to the east and west both seem as utterly hopeless to continue down.

Room.Name: Dismal Room
Room.Description: You feel burdened by some unseen force here. You can barely keep you legs under you as you take a few steps to get used to the weakness. You can go to the east and west both seem as utterly hopeless to continue down.

Room.Name: Dismal Room
Room.Description: You feel burdened by some unseen force here. You can barely keep you legs under you as you take a few steps to get used to the weakness. You can go to the east and west both seem as utterly hopeless to continue down.

Room.Name: Dismal Corner
Room.Description: You feel burdened by some unseen force here. You can barely keep you legs under you as you take a few steps to get used to the weakness. You can go to the east and north both seem as utterly hopeless to continue down.

Room.Name: Dismal Room
Room.Description: You feel burdened by some unseen force here. You can barely keep you legs under you as you take a few steps to get used to the weakness. You can go to the east, north and south all seem as utterly hopeless to continue down.

Exit.Flags: Door Closed Locked PickProof NoPass NoBash

Room.Name: Demon room
Room.Description: The walls seem to breath and move with the demon that fades slowly into view through the protal on the wall.

Exit.Flags: Door Closed Locked PickProof NoPass NoBash

Room.Name: Dismal room
Room.Description: You feel burdened by some unseen force here. You can barely keep you legs under you as you take a few steps to get used to the weakness. You can go to the north and south both seem as utterly hopeless to continue down.

Room.Name: Dismal room
Room.Description: You feel burdened by some unseen force here. You can barely keep you legs under you as you take a few steps to get used to the weakness. You can go to the east, north and south all seem as utterly hopeless to continue down.

Exit.Flags: Door Closed PickProof NoPass NoBash

Room.Name: Demon Room
Room.Description: The walls shimmer and flash as the protal at the end of the room bursts to life as you enter.

Exit.Flags: Door Closed Locked PickProof NoPass NoBash

Room.Name: Dismal Room
Room.Description: You feel burdened by some unseen force here. You can barely keep you legs under you as you take a few steps to get used to the weakness. You can go to the north and south both seem as utterly hopeless to continue down.

Room.Name: Dismal Corner
Room.Description: You feel burdened by some unseen force here. You can barely keep you legs under you as you take a few steps to get used to the weakness. You can go to the east and south both seem as utterly hopeless to continue down.

Room.Name: Dismal Room
Room.Description: You feel burdened by some unseen force here. You can barely keep you legs under you as you take a few steps to get used to the weakness. You can go to the east and west both seem as utterly hopeless to continue down.

Room.Name: Dismal Room
Room.Description: You feel burdened by some unseen force here. You can barely keep you legs under you as you take a few steps to get used to the weakness. You can go to the east and west both seem as utterly hopeless to continue down.

Room.Name: Dismal Room
Room.Description: You feel burdened by some unseen force here. You can barely keep you legs under you as you take a few steps to get used to the weakness. You can go to the east and west both seem as utterly hopeless to continue down.

Room.Name: Dismal Room
Room.Description: You feel burdened by some unseen force here. You can barely keep you legs under you as you take a few steps to get used to the weakness. You can go to the east and west both seem as utterly hopeless to continue down.

Room.Name: Dismal Room
Room.Description: You feel burdened by some unseen force here. You can barely keep you legs under you as you take a few steps to get used to the weakness. You can go to the east and west both seem as utterly hopeless to continue down.

Room.Name: Dismal Intersection
Room.Description: You feel burdened by some unseen force here. You can barely keep you legs under you as you take a few steps to get used to the weakness. You can go to the north, east and west all seem as utterly hopeless to continue down.

Room.Name: Down to the Death Walk
Room.Description: As you enter the room your uneasyness gets worse, your stomach begins to heave and sway and your eyes get blurry. You can go south or go down to death.

Room.Name: Death Walk
Room.Description: This is your walk of death, there is no life beyond this, there is no love no hope, only your death.

Room.Name: Death Walk
Room.Description: This is your walk of death, there is no life beyond this, there is no love no hope, only your death.

Room.Name: Death Walk
Room.Description: This is your walk of death, there is no life beyond this, there is no love no hope, only your death.

Room.Name: Death Walk
Room.Description: This is your walk of death, there is no life beyond this, there is no love no hope, only your death.

Room.Name: Death walk
Room.Description: This is your walk of death, there is no life beyond this, there is no love no hope, only your death. The walk comes to an end with a giant dragon standing infront of a door.

Exit.Flags: Door Closed Locked PickProof NoPass NoBash

Room.Name: Beyond the Dragon Door
Room.Description: Takeing a few deep breaths you seem to feel better than before the door. You gain you footing and the nausea has gone away.. hopefully the worst is over, you hope. You can continue to the east.

Room.Name: Walk of Tranquility
Room.Description: The room is blessed and seems to have a light of it's own, it fills you with serentiy and peace. You know that your journey has been for naught if but you can bask in the light here. The path continues to the east and west

Room.Name: Turn In The Walk Of Tranqulity
Room.Description: The room is blessed and seems to have a light of it's own, it fills you with serentiy and peace. You know that your journey has been for naught if but you can bask in the light here. The path continues to the north and west.

Room.Name: Walk Of Tranquility
Room.Description: The room is blessed and seems to have a light of it's own, it fills you with serentiy and peace. You know that your journey has been for naught if but you can bask in the light here. The path continues to the north and south.

Room.Name: Turn In the Walk Of Tranquility
Room.Description: The room is blessed and seems to have a light of it's own, it fills you with serentiy and peace. You know that your journey has been for naught if but you can bask in the light here. The path continues to the west and south.

Room.Name: Turn In the Walk Of Tranquilty
Room.Description: The room is blessed and seems to have a light of it's own, it fills you with serentiy and peace. You know that your journey has been for naught if but you can bask in the light here. The path continues to the north and east.

Room.Name: Walk Of Tranquility
Room.Description: The room is blessed and seems to have a light of it's own, it fills you with serentiy and peace. You know that your journey has been for naught if but you can bask in the light here. The path continues to the north and south.

Room.Name: Tranquil Room
Room.Description: In this room you feel more at peace than you ever have. The room seems to be basked in an aura comming from the doors on the west and east. You can continue to the north , east , west and south.

Exit.Flags: Door Closed Locked PickProof NoPass NoBash
Door Closed Locked PickProof NoPass NoBash

Room.Name: Golden Room
Room.Description: In this room the light is golden and fresh. You realize this is not just a room, but a prison. It is the prison for Hope. You can go back out to the east.

Exit.Flags: Door Closed PickProof NoPass NoBash

Room.Name: Silver Room
Room.Description: In this room the silver fills you with a sense of peace more other than you have ever felt before. It is so lovely and beautifull in the room you could lay down and sleep forever. You can go back out to the west.

Exit.Flags: Door Closed Locked PickProof NoPass NoBash

Room.Name: Blessed Walkway
Room.Description: The room is blessed and seems to have a light of it's own, it fills you with serentiy and peace. You know that your journey has been for naught if but you can bask in the light here. The path continues to the north and south.

Room.Name: Turn In The Blessed Walkway
Room.Description: The room is blessed and seems to have a light of it's own, it fills you with serentiy and peace. You know that your journey has been for naught if but you can bask in the light here. The path continues to the west and south.

Room.Name: Turn In the Blessed Walkway
Room.Description: The room is blessed and seems to have a light of it's own, it fills you with serentiy and peace. You know that your journey has been for naught if but you can bask in the light here. The path continues to the north and east.

Room.Name: End Of The Blessed Walkway.
Room.Description: Standing in this room the peace and hopefull feeling you had diminishes. The fear and vomitus rise again in you chest. The Door before you stands thick and well insulated. No light plays before it nor does any come from within it's hinges. A lone guard stands before the doorway above.

Exit.Flags: Door Closed Locked PickProof NoPass NoBash

Room.Name: Top Of The Stairs
Room.Description: At the top of the stairs the darkness overwhelms you. A great fog covers the Door to the room to the South.

Exit.Flags: Door Closed Locked PickProof NoPass NoBash

Room.Name: Fog
Room.Description: This room Make you queezy, you can not tell up from down or left from right.

Exit.Flags: Door Closed PickProof NoPass NoBash

Room.Name: Other Side of the Fog
Room.Description: Fog passes by your face as you step near the exit to the west. You can continue into the blackness to the east.

Room.Name: ThankGiving Turkey's Room
Room.Description: As you look in this room ThanksGiving turkeys run around with their heads chopped off.

Exit.Flags: Door Closed PickProof NoPass NoBash

Room.Name: Easter Bunny's Secret Lair
Room.Description: This room is filled with large colourfull eggs, candy lines shelves from one wall to another. There are some large vats bubbling in the corner of the room, as a large bunny stirs.

Exit.Flags: Door Closed Locked PickProof NoPass NoBash
Door Closed Locked PickProof NoPass NoBash
Door Closed Locked PickProof NoPass NoBash

Room.Name: Hallway to the End
Room.Description: The halway streches east and you stomach turns you know you are near the source of all this darkness. You can go west to the fog.

Room.Name: Turn in Hallway to the End
Room.Description: The Hallway Curves towards the south from the west.

Room.Name: Hallway to the End.
Room.Description: The halway streches south and you stomach turns you know you are near the source of all this darkness. You can go north and the feeling lifts a little bit.

Room.Name: Door Before the End
Room.Description: The door is large and pitted , something has beaten against this door many a times and has been burned and etched with magics and weapons. Behind it you know lies the root of all this death and evil.

Exit.Flags: Door Closed Locked PickProof NoPass NoBash

Room.Name: Barney's Room
Room.Description: Yes it is Barney, the true evil of the land , he pretended to be a lovable childs toy but twisted and turned their fragile little minds.

Exit.Flags: Door Closed Locked PickProof NoPass NoBash
Door Closed Locked PickProof NoPass NoBash

Room.Name: Room Beyond Barney
Room.Description: In this room the light sheds upon you again, the worst is over and you know you have defeated you worst demons... You are safe for now <<< Till BARNEY RETURNS!!!>>>

Exit.Flags: Door Closed PickProof NoPass NoBash

NPC.name: Vigilant guardian man Death
NPC.description: The Guardian of Death stands motionless beside the large iron doors. He seems to stares you down as you get closer to the door yet he does not move.
NPC.longDescription: An Ever Vigilant Man Guards the Passageway to Death
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger StayArea Mage AssistAll
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary Infrared ProtectGood Sneak Flying Haste Berserk DetectIllusion

NPC.name: Keeper Souls
NPC.description: The Keeper of the Souls grins and licks his lips as you can feel your soul draining from you.
NPC.longDescription: The Keeper of the Souls stares you down as you enter the room.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Undead AreaAttack AssistAll
NPC.affectedBy: Invisible DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary Infrared ProtectEvil ProtectGood Flying PassDoor Haste Berserk DetectIllusion

NPC.name: Black Keeper Keys
NPC.description: The Keeper of the keys is dressed in black from head to toe. Black armor adorns every inch of his body.
NPC.longDescription: The Keeper of the Keys stand here, angry at your intrusion
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Warrior AssistAll
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary Infrared ProtectEvil ProtectGood Flying PassDoor Haste Berserk DetectIllusion

NPC.name: Acolyte man cleric
NPC.description: A man in dark flowing robes stands here, his robes show the markings of a clerical order.
NPC.longDescription: A man in dark robes stand here, eyeing every move you make.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Cleric AssistAll
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary Infrared ProtectEvil ProtectGood PassDoor Haste Berserk DetectIllusion

NPC.name: man watcher
NPC.description: Looking at him he seems not even to noitce you or care of his tattered robes and dirty hair. But suddenly a fire burns within his eyes as the orb glows brightly on one image, it is of you entering this room.
NPC.longDescription: A man stares deep into the orb on the pedestal unaware of your presence, or is he?
NPC.shortDescription: A man looking into an orb
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Mage AreaAttack AssistAll
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary Infrared ProtectEvil ProtectGood PassDoor Haste Berserk DetectIllusion

NPC.name: Harem Girl
NPC.description: An elven girl stand before you, her clothes tattered and bareing almost everything. She is bleeding and battered. She moves about the room surveying her master anything he bellows for.
NPC.longDescription: A Harem girl looks as you as you enter the room, her eyes beg for your help.
NPC.flags: NPC StayArea Wimpy Warrior
NPC.affectedBy: DetectHidden FaerieFire Infrared Sneak

NPC.name: Master
NPC.description: The Master lays upon the pillows in the room being waited on hand and foot. His clothes are beutifully kept and although the odd stain does dabble his pants.
NPC.longDescription: The Master lays here lying upon pillows and blanket.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Warrior AssistAll
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary Infrared ProtectEvil ProtectGood Flying PassDoor Haste Berserk DetectIllusion

NPC.name: Blue Ringkeeper
NPC.description: The Ringkeeper stands here in armor bluer than the ocean. He glares at you as you enter the room.
NPC.longDescription: A Large Ringkeeper of the keys stands here in all blue armor.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Warrior AreaAttack AssistAll
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary ProtectEvil ProtectGood PassDoor Haste Berserk DetectIllusion

NPC.name: Sentry Putrid
NPC.description: The sentry looks as though it were once alive but has long since died. Its armor and body send the smell of decay and rotting throughout the room.
NPC.longDescription: A sentry stands here reeking of death.
NPC.flags: NPC Scavenger Warrior AssistGuard
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden ProtectGood Sneak Haste DetectIllusion

NPC.name: Sentry Captain
NPC.description: A sentry stands before you fashioned in clothes of blue, black and red. You can tell that he is the captain and holds the other sentry's in line.
NPC.longDescription: A sentry stands here decorated in blue black and red.
NPC.flags: NPC Scavenger Aggressive Warrior AreaAttack AssistPlayers
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary ProtectGood Sneak PassDoor Berserk DetectIllusion

NPC.name: Weeping Guard
NPC.description: The guard looks back at you, his eyes red and burned from the sobbing. You know he has sucum to the utter hoplessness of this place.
NPC.longDescription: A guard stands here crying, blocking the door to the west.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger Aggressive Warrior AssistGuard
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary ProtectEvil Sneak Haste DetectIllusion

NPC.name: Mimic Bed
NPC.description: As you look at the bed you notice it moving slightly as if breathing.
NPC.longDescription: A large bed sits in the corner of the room, it seems to be breathing
NPC.shortDescription: A bed sits in the corner of the room
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger Aggressive Thief AssistAll
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary ProtectEvil ProtectGood Haste DetectIllusion

NPC.name: Demon Fear
NPC.description: The demon stares coldly into you eyes making you lose all hope. It licks it's lips and grins as you approach. It is hungry.
NPC.longDescription: A demon stand here sending shivers down you spine with but a look.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger Aggressive Undead AreaAttack AssistAll
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary ProtectEvil ProtectGood Hide Haste Berserk DetectIllusion

NPC.name: demon Hate
NPC.description: A demon raises up upon his wings in this huge room, it hisses at you and strikes out.
NPC.longDescription: A demon stares you down angry at your intrustion.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger Aggressive Undead AreaAttack
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary ProtectGood Hide Haste Berserk DetectIllusion

NPC.name: Dragon deathwalk
NPC.description: He looks you up and down and a growl comes from him, a large smile grows upon his lips and speaks "Ummm Fresh Meat".
NPC.longDescription: A Large dragon stands infront of you , Laughing as your ineptness.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger Aggressive Mage AreaAttack AssistAll
NPC.affectedBy: Invisible DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary ProtectGood Flying Berserk DetectIllusion Infrared

NPC.name: Hope
NPC.description: As you look upon hope you heart lifts to the sky and flys through the air light as a feather. No care in the world you return down before Hope, it smiles and you feel better having had this expreience.
NPC.longDescription: Hope stands infront of you making you feel warm and cozy.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger Aggressive Cleric AreaAttack AssistAll
NPC.affectedBy: Invisible DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary ProtectEvil Flying PassDoor Haste Berserk DetectIllusion

NPC.name: Peace
NPC.description: You look upon peace and nothing is seen of it, but you look right into yourself. You see all the wrong and disjustice you have commited and you begin to plead for redemption.
NPC.longDescription: As you look upon Peace you will to fight is relinquished.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger Cleric Fade
NPC.affectedBy: Invisible DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary ProtectEvil Flying PassDoor Haste Berserk DetectIllusion

NPC.name: guardian destruction man
NPC.description: Looking upon this man strains you eyes as no light shines from him, everything he wears is black and dark.
NPC.longDescription: A large man stands here enveolped in a black haze.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger Aggressive Warrior AreaAttack AssistAll
NPC.affectedBy: Invisible DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary ProtectGood Flying PassDoor Haste Berserk DetectIllusion

NPC.name: Angelic Spirit
NPC.description: A spirit roams the halls, wings of an angel upon it's back.
NPC.longDescription: A spirit Walks the Halls here.
NPC.flags: NPC Scavenger Warrior AssistVnum
NPC.affectedBy: Invisible DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary ProtectEvil Flying PassDoor DetectIllusion DarkVision

NPC.name: Ethereal Angel
NPC.description: As you stare upon the angel it flickers and shifts with the motion of he air passing through it.
NPC.longDescription: A spirit stands infront of you flickeringin and swaying with your breath.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger Mage AssistAll
NPC.affectedBy: Invisible DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary ProtectEvil Hide Flying PassDoor DetectIllusion

NPC.name: Easter Bunny
NPC.description: As you look upon the Easter Bunny he no longer holds that wholesum loveable bunny apeal, you see him for what he really is.... and what he really is doing to the kids of the world..
NPC.longDescription: A large bunny stands in the corner by a vat, teeth gleaming at you.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger Mage
NPC.affectedBy: Invisible DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary Infrared ProtectGood Hide Flying PassDoor DetectIllusion

NPC.name: Turkey
NPC.description: You look at the turkey as blood flows from it's neck , spurting and gushing as it runs around.
NPC.longDescription: You look at the turkey and IT DOES NOT HAVE A HEAD!
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger Thief
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Infrared ProtectEvil ProtectGood DetectIllusion

NPC.name: Barney
NPC.description: Barney the Dinosaur the one true evil of the world. He would gut you like a pig with one claw behind his back. His body writhes with a million childrens souls within him.
NPC.longDescription: Barney the dinosuar stands here sharpening his teeth on small children's parents.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive Mage Warrior AreaAttack AssistAll
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary Infrared ProtectEvil ProtectGood PassDoor Haste Berserk DetectIllusion

NPC.name: Custodian
NPC.description: You look upon him and he is wearing old coveralls and gloves. He goes about cleaning and sorting like you are not even there.
NPC.longDescription: The Custodian goes about his work completly oblivious of you.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Mage Warrior AreaAttack
NPC.affectedBy: Invisible DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary ProtectEvil ProtectGood PassDoor Haste DetectIllusion

Item.LongDescription: A keyring lies here filled with keys of a deep blue.

Item.Name: Ringkeepers Spear blue
Item.LongDescription: A spear lies here of the deepest blue.

Item.LongDescription: Leather lies here rotting and smelling.

Item.LongDescription: A vial lies here filled with some viscus red liquid.

Item.Name: Flashy Key
Item.LongDescription: Key lies here covered in all diffrent colors, it apprears to belong to someone who lusts for wealth.

Item.Name: plate tears
Item.LongDescription: Platemail stained with the tears of the guard lies here.

Item.LongDescription: A pair of gloves stained with the tears of a man lies here.

Item.LongDescription: A locket lies here filled with tears.

Item.Name: Tear
Item.LongDescription: A tear lies here sharp at one end.

Item.Name: bed leg
Item.LongDescription: A bed leg lies here.

Item.Name: Dismal Key
Item.LongDescription: A key lies here and you abandon all hope as you grasp it.

Item.Name: Scaled armplates

Item.LongDescription: A small Easter egg used as a key

Item.Name: Fear

Item.LongDescription: A shield lies here unused in combat.
Item.ExtraFlags: Glow Hum Magic AntiEvil AntiNeutral VisDeath BurnProof

Item.Name: Axe Desruction
Item.LongDescription: A axe lies here, everything it touches disolves.
Item.ExtraFlags: Glow Hum Evil NoDrop AntiGood NoRemove BurnProof Vorpal TwoHands Shocking Poison Unholy

Item.LongDescription: A chain of blackend metal lies upon the ground here.

Item.LongDescription: A ring lies here allowing you to pass.

Item.Name: Angel mace heavens
Item.LongDescription: A Mace glows briliantly as a light from the heavens shines down through the dark

Item.LongDescription: A Whip of brilliant golden light lies here.

Item.Name: Vat bubbling
Item.LongDescription: A large vat is bubbling in the Corner, a sign is on the side of the vat.

ExtraDescription.Description: As you look closer to the vat and read the sign you get nauseus and begin to vommit. The sign says 0 Children Zombiefication Exlir0

Item.Name: Easter Egg
Item.LongDescription: A large egg beutifully painted lies her.
Item.ExtraFlags: Glow Hum Evil NoDrop NoRemove VisDeath BurnProof Vorpal TwoHands Shocking Poison

Item.LongDescription: A turkey's head lies here.

Item.LongDescription: Barney's head lies here.

Item.Name: Skin
Item.LongDescription: After skinning Barney it looks as though you could wear it as a cloak.
Item.ExtraFlags: Glow Hum Evil NoDrop AntiGood VisDeath MeltDrop BurnProof

Item.LongDescription: A dangerous scroll lies here.

Item.Name: Scroll Overkill Maximum
Item.LongDescription: A scroll looks very very deadly on the ground.

Item.LongDescription: A corpse of a turkey rests here , head strewn across the room.

Item.LongDescription: An adventures corpse lies here.

ExtraDescription.Description: The corpse looks riddled with bites and claws. Its blood pools around it's head and bloody clots make it hard for you to step around it.

Item.LongDescription: Scales from the dragon of death are shaped into a makeshift belt
